title: Sell Compass Box Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Compass Box Whisky | Limited Editions & Vintages | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Compass Box whisky. We buy limited editions like Hedonism, The General, This Is Not A Luxury Whisky, and Tobias & The Angel.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Compass Box Limited Editions.
introParagraph: Compass Box revolutionized Scotch blending. Their limited editions are artistic masterpieces of both liquid and design. We buy the rare, discontinued releases.
whatWeBuy: Compass Box This Is Not A Luxury Whisky
conditionFactors: Edition: 'Flaming Heart' has many editions (15th anniversary, etc). 1st Edition is key.
Label: Beautiful paper labels. Scuffs hurt.
Box: 'This Is Not A Luxury Whisky' has no box, but others like 'The General' do.
pricingFactors: Rarity: 'The General' and 'Lady Luck' are the unicorns (> $1000).
Discontinued: 'Eleuthera' and 'Asyla' are gone, so they have value.
Hedonism: The original grain whisky that started it all. First bottlings are rare.

faqs.question: Do you buy Peat Monster?
faqs.answer: Only the Arcana, Cask Strength, or 10th Anniversary editions.

faqs.question: What is 'The General'?
faqs.answer: A legendary blend of two casks aged 33 years. Extremely rare.

faqs.question: Do you buy 'No Name'?
faqs.answer: Yes, No Name 1, 2, and 3 are collectible peat monsters.

faqs.question: Is blended whisky valuable?
faqs.answer: Compass Box proved it is. Their high-end blends rival any single malt.

faqs.question: How do I identify the edition?
faqs.answer: Check the back label codes or the release year.
